author: kakrtkersey
title: Short break in Rome
text: Lovely hotel.very clean and comfortable. Staff all friendly, welcoming and helpful. Really good as a base to explore Rome. Option of a kettle free of charge is a perk you don't get everywhere in Italy. We chose the shuttle bus option from the airport to the hotel (extra but worth it) We had a great time thank you.
